Title: A.K.A. The Plant
Plot: Nancy takes on an alias to help Conrad set up the grow house. Isabelle get approached to be a model. Interesting things happen to Celia while she's on the campaign trail. Shane makes an attempt to fit in at his school. Andy takes Shane to a massage parlor. Shane gets a surprise and Silas has one as well.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Jeanne Chinn, Rhea Kohan, Molly Bryant, Diane Sellers, Marty Ryan, Clint Culp, Franc Ross, Ron Canada
